dublin_core.dcvalue: The mHealth for Integrated Community Case Management application is used by community health workers in Malawi as a village register, a supervisory tool, and a link to the logistics management system.
mHealth for Integrated Community Case Management
CHW, Civil society organization, Facility-based provider, Facility, Public sector health system (national, regional, district)
Eric Saforo, Country Director, D-tree International â€“ Malawi, Email: esaforo@d-tree.org
mHealth for Integrated Community Case Management

Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Electronic health records, Registries and vital events tracking, Supply chain management, Child health, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases, Maternal health, Newborn health, Non-communicable diseases, Primary care
